definitions.title: Shaph.
definitions.body: as loan-word from As. šûzub(u), ušêib, deliver, √ ezêbu ([[א]]:4 = [[עזב]]), Dl:Pr 140 Hpt:GGN 1583, 91; BAS i.13 K:§ 43, 1, Anm.; Targum [[שֵׁיזֵב]], Syr. 4uwzeb, Chr-Pal. 4wz b Schulth:Lex. 203, also Nab. [[שיזב]] Cooke:255; cf. n.pr. [[מְשֵׁיזַבְאֵל]] BH; OAram. [[חלמשזב]] SAC:102; v. also foll. art.);—Pf. 3 ms. [[שֵׁיזִב]] Da 3:28, Da 6:28; Impf. 3 ms. [[יְשֵׁיזִ֑ב]] Da 3:17; sf. [[יְשֵׁיזְבִנׇּךְ]] Da 6:17, [[נְִ֠כבוֹן]] Da 3:13; Inf. sf. [[לְשֵׁיזׇבוּתָךְ]] Da 6:21, [[הֵתּ]]- v:Da 6:15, [[תַָנׇּא]]- Da 3:17;—deliver (usu. c. [[מִן]]): Da 3:17, [[ל]] acc. pers. v:Da 3:28, Da 6:28 b, sf. pers. Da 3:15, Da 3:17 a, Da 6:15, Da 6:17, Da 6:21, abs. v:Da 6:28 a.
